categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Manda was a Human male who served the Sith Empire on the Sith capital planet of Dromund Kaas as a contact for Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War. While hanging out in the local cantina, another operative was directed to Manda by Minder Twenty. The operative was given a gambling chip, and sent to speak to a Chiss security officer.
